name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 28: The Dungeon RPG
overview: To the underground maze of darkness! Adventurers, it's now time for take off! Make well use of more than 50 types of weapons, protective gears and various types of items, fight against monsters of distinctive characters while your protagonist gets leveled-up. In this RPG game, clear various traps that stand in your way and aim for the "Legendary gem" at the deepest part of the dungeon. The self-generating maps can be played again as many times as you want.
